name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi platter with fresh salmon, tuna, and avocado rolls.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

name: Steak Frites
description: Grilled steak with a side of crispy French fries and herb butter.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Taco Fiesta
description: Tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Burger Palace
description: Juicy beef burger with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and a special sauce.

name: Green Garden Salads
description: Fresh mixed greens with tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light vinaigrette.

name: Vegan Vibes
description: A delicious vegan bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and hummus.

name: Seafood Sensations
description: A platter of grilled shrimp, scallops, and fish with a lemon butter sauce.
